comment: Mitch was my favorite professor through all years of school including Highschool. He really does care about his students and he goes above and beyond to make sure we are successful in life. I've had him for 3 semesters and my only complaint is that I couldn't have him a fourth.

Professor Olson has the best class you can take at KSU. He makes writing fun and genuinely wants you to succeed not just in his class, but in life in general. I've taken him twice now and I cannot recommend him more. He is very understanding and super funny. To sum it up, he is who you'd call the GOAT, just trust me and take one of his classes.

Funny and charismatic, makes the class go by super fast and keeps everyone engaged. The work is easy as long as your interested in screen writing or writing in general (but why are you taking a screenwriting course if your not interested in it?) Overall, I recommend. MY GOAT!
It was a really fun class that was mostly paced based on the class. He really wants people to grow in this class and goes out of his way to help everyone improve.
Caring and individual responses; encouraged each of us and motivated us to do good work.
He's cool,understanding and easy to contact

Professor Olson is everything that you want in a writing instructor. He gives clear feedback, he has a wealth of knowledge about the art of writing for television (and film going by the good reviews), and is an utter delight in lectures. Just one thing, if you want the best experience, go to all the lectures. The feedback he gives is divine.

Professor Olson is extremely supportive and creates an atmosphere of growth in class. Everyone feels accepted in class, whether they are writing an edgy screenplay filled with foul language or something that would go on the Hallmark channel. He loves screenwriting, but his favorite professional thing seems to be rooting for his students' success.

Mitch is the best professor I've ever had. He treats everyone with respect--even if you're brand new to screenwriting. I am primarily a poet, and I still got so much out of this class that I know will be useful to me in the future. If you have even a slight interest in creative writing, take him. He's so kind and caring. KSU is lucky to have him.

Professor Olsen is a really great professor, not only does he make sure you learn skills that are applicable for working in a real writers room, but he also gives impactful feedback on your script that will help you turn it into a piece you could pitch. Great class!

Mitch was easily one of the best professors I have taken!! He's had years of experience so you're getting industry-level advice, but he's also so down to earth, funny, and understanding. The workload is super manageable, and you will learn SO much about storytelling, creativity, and diligence. TAKE INTRO TO SCREENWRITING!! You won't regret it!!
rating_tags: Hilarious--Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment: Mitch is one of the best professors I've ever taken; he genuinely inspired me in screenwriting and helped me feel confident taking his class even though I had no experience in the field or subject. I was always very motivated to attend his class and strive to do my best, and he has so much useful knowledge to share. Plus he's super kind and funny.

It takes a special kind of professor to be both wonderfully kind and genuinely constructive, and Mitch is one of those people! I'm getting choked up just by typing this, but if you want a meaningful experience at KSU, I implore you to take one (or, rather, as many as possible) of his classes -- just know that I'll be a little bit jealous!
One of the only professors to truly impact my career. He's caring, understanding, and supportive. I would highly recommend him to any other student if they want a life-changing experience. Thank you.

He's a wonderful teacher with a heart of gold. He makes you believe that you stand a chance in the real world. I cherish our time spent together and wish fo everyone to do the same when taking his class. I would recommend him. Enjoy spending time with one of the best teachers at the university.

I loved Mitch's class so much! From day one, it was an engaging, educational, supportive, silly (/pos) environment, one of the few classes I've felt myself come away from with something so tangible and also actually connect with my prof. I look forward to taking as many of his classes as possible!!

Mitch is easily the best prof I've ever had. Never have I had someone who is as nice AND productive as Mitch. For most profs, it feels like they sacrifice one quality in favor of the other, but Mitch manages to give great feedback on your scripts without making you feel like an idiot for it. That plus his industry stories make this class awesome.

Best professor at KSU. Whether you enjoy writing or you are just getting started, Olsen will help your storytelling chops. Above all, he WANTS you to succeed. He also qualifies for every other positive trait: Extra Credit, Clear Grading Criteria, Hilarious, etc. So yeah, what are you still doing here? Take his class already.
Professor Olson is absolutely amazing! He really cares about his students and is always there for you when ever you need him. Don't think just take him. You won't regret it.

I took his summer intro to screenwriting class and even though this class was an elective for me, I really enjoyed it. As long as you participate , follow the directions and turn in your work on time you will get an A. The only challenge is being pushed out of your comfort zone which is not always a bad thing.

Great professor. Gives great feedback on your scripts and will almost go line by line and say where to improve. Incredibly knowledgeable from actually working in film/TV, and on top of improving your writing he also helps to prepare students to work in the industry with relevant projects (preparing pitches, marketing yourself as a writer, etc.)
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Best class I have taken in college. Professor Olson makes it really fun

Best professor at KSU! He has incredible advice and industry knowledge, and he genuinely wants every student to succeed in and out of the classroom. My writing has gotten unbelievably stronger through his classes and mentorship. Take him as much as you can!
Professor Olson is the BEST! So supportive and respectful of his students. He really cares about each student's success. If you want to learn screenwriting and want a great professor, take his class!
Mitch is the best professor I've ever had. He's easy to talk to and always available to help you with your work as well as discussing future career paths. Would take this class over and over again.

Don't think, just do it! Mitch is beyond a great professor! Has plenty of inspiring stories from his career, always knows exactly what your script needs to take it to the next level, and 100% cares about his students & our success. I'm taking him again for the advanced writing course! If you want to be a screenwriter or just be creative, take him!

BEST professor I have ever had!!!! I learned so much about screenwriting in this class in the most fun ways possible. Professor Olson is the absolute best prof I've ever had and I literally wish I could take him again. I can not say enough good things about this class and how sad I am that my semester is over. Easy grade if you do the work!

The feedback I've gotten in this class has been so helpful. Professor Olson always gives constructive criticism in a very laid-back, nonjudgmental way, which makes you feel more comfortable sharing what you've written. His suggestions have helped me become a better writer and I couldn't recommend him enough.

I have never had a professor like this before. He truly believes that everyone has great ideas and potential and he does everything he can to help students succeed. He genuinely wants to help others succeed in his class and in life. His class is VERY rewarding. It has truly changed me for the better and it is all thanks to this professor.

Professor Olson is a class act. He has a lot of experience in the industry, but is super encouraging for those that are new to screenwriting. You don'thave to be super experienced to do well and there's a lot of opportunity for improvement.
I mean quite literally the BEST professor at this school. Really wants you to succeed and all the other quality feedback stuff. Take him. Its imperative

Mitch Olson is honestly the best professor I've ever had at KSU. He is so inspirational and pushes his students to be the best writers that they can be. I was scared at first to receive feedback, but he is so nice and cares so much for his students. As long as you reach your page count, you're going to get an A in the class. TAKE HIS CLASS!!!!!!
Best person at KSU
Prof. Olson is great! He has so much experience. He gives great feedback and his classes are super engaging and fun.

Professor Olson is one of the best professors out there. He has gone above and beyond to be available outside of class time and ensure every student's success. Not only is he a great professor in the class, but he connects his students with job opportunities in the film industry. Seriously a life changing class.
His feedback is terrible. He's difficult to get in touch with and you never know where you stand with your grade. Taking Prof. Olson's class was an awful experience.

Professor Olson is easily one of the best professors I have had at KSU. Even when everything got moved to online, he was with us 100%. His film writing class is an especially great choice for anyone wanting to be a script writer, but honestly anyone can and should take it.

Mitch is the type of prof. that talks the talk and walks the walk. He's an industry insider whose feedback is always geared to help you land your movie/tv scripts in a real production environment. 10/10 would recommend him to anyone who has serious script writing ambitions.

Mitch is one of the most caring professors I've had. If you put in the work and show you care, you'll be fine. It's also very participation heavy, because... you know.. you're writing scripts and are expected to... improve. 10/10 recommend
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Participation matters

comment: 10/10 would take again. Literally wish he taught more classes.

My favorite professor during my 4 years at KSU. Took his Writing for Film and TV course and loved it so the following semester I took his Advance course. First time I have ever been sad about a class ending. Really genuine guy that cares and invests in your work! The course itself is hard work, but its the one class I enjoyed every minute of it.

In 6 years of college Mitch is the best professor I have ever had. He deeply cares about his students and pushes hard for their success. He is so encouraging and knows so much about the film industry and screenwriting and he's so clearly passionate about sharing his knowledge. Take this class. It'll push you hard but it is so worth every second.

Fantastic professor. Enthusiastic, interesting, funny, and great at what he teaches - one of the best professors I've had in college. It's rare that I feel sad when a class is over, but I'm going to genuinely miss the workshop experience with my FILM 3105 class. If you want to take a screenwriting class, take it with Mitch.

One of the best professors I've ever had. If you fail this, it's on you. You're also gonna be writing A LOT, but he teaches screenwriting, so you know what you're getting into. Just stay on top of your deadlines and you're gonna be fine.
Really good class! You learn a lot about writing for film and tv. Got to go on set of a film being shot! Clear with all of his grading rules! Take this class!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Clear grading criteria

comment: A Serious Positive Unique Nice Kind Young Beast Okay Inspirational professor
